function.name: buildApiStatusUrl
function.eval: concat(property('api.status'),'/',$report,'/',$topology, choose($entity1!='_entity_' and $entity2='_entity_',concat('/',$entity1,'/services')), choose($entity2!='_entity_' and $entity3='_entity_',concat('/',$entity1,'/services/',$entity2,'/endpoints')), choose($entity3!='_entity_' and $entity4='_entity_',concat('/',$entity1,'/services/',$entity2,'/endpoints/',$entity3,'/metrics')),'?view=details&start_time=',$start_time,'&end_time=',$end_time)

function.name: buildStatusLink
function.eval: concat($report,'/',$topology, choose($entity1!='_entity_' and $entity2='_entity_',concat('/',$entity1)), choose($entity2!='_entity_' and $entity3='_entity_',concat('/',$entity1,'/',$entity2)), choose($entity3!='_entity_' and $entity4='_entity_' ,concat('/metrics/',$entity3)) )
